attributes.action: Employ Warren Buffet to look at Corporation Tax Loopholes
attributes.additional_details:
I propose that Warren Buffet is employed as a Consultant to look at the loopholes that massively rich corporations use to minimise their tax liability, and get out of their fair share of contributions to the UK Treasury.

Warren Buffet has recently complained that he is not taxed at anywhere near the rate at which the average citizen is taxed, and wants to be taxed more fairly, rather than have lots of ways of significantly minimising his tax liability, simply because he is "Super Rich".
